item.title: Accidental list mutation with asterisk
item.author: email@example.com (James Chua)
item.description: Let’s say you want to create a list, which has another 10 empty lists. Meaning that you want to create a list that looks like this: [[], [], [], [], [], [], [], [], [], []] You might be tempted to do this: lists = [[]] * 10 print(lists) # Output: [[], [], [], [], [], [], [], [], [], []] That looks ok! But this will not work as expected.
